Athena.Data catalog/metastore: The meta data: table names, column names/types
Athena.Data Source Connector: Fetches data from non-S3 locations (via Lambda)

Aurora: MySQL and Postgres compatible database replacement
Control Tower: Guard Rails (plain english guides) with Preventative and Detective types.
Three Categories: Mandatory, Strongly Recommended, Elective.
Preventive guides work via SCP (Service control policies)
